productDescription: This shirt is woven out of a special blend of high-grade ultrafine micron merino, polyester, nylon, spandex, and elastane (lycra) materials to keep you cool and comfortable, while silver nanoparticles to keep you smelling fresh by preventing odor-causing bacteria.

productReviews.name: James
productReviews.Comments: This shirt does wonders to wick away sweat!
